rca_result.root_cause: Multiple AWS service health events are active, with the most critical being Auto Scaling launch template not found and VPN redundancy loss affecting infrastructure availability
evidence: AWS_EC2_AUTOSCALING_LAUNCH_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND event is open - prevents new instance launches
Multiple AWS_VPN_REDUNDANCY_LOSS events are open - indicates VPN connectivity issues
Multiple AWS_LAMBDA_PLANNED_LIFECYCLE_EVENT events are open/upcoming - service disruptions expected
AWS_KAFKA_HIGH_RISK_CONFIG_RF_EQUALS_ONE event indicates single point of failure in Kafka cluster

remediation.suggestion: Restore missing Auto Scaling launch template and investigate VPN redundancy issues
checklist: Check Auto Scaling group configuration and recreate missing launch template
Verify VPN connection status and redundancy configuration
Review Lambda function lifecycle events and plan for service continuity
Increase Kafka replication factor from 1 to at least 2 for redundancy
Monitor all affected services during remediation
